divs: sighting detailsfloor 17 of the bellagio in las vegas, nv. i just arrived in my hotel room and decided to take pictures of the lights outside of the hotel room window. i did not see anything unusual when i took the pictures but when i got home and downloaded them on my computer, an unusual object appeared. i have other pictures outside of the window of the hotel room and none of them have this object in it. the object is in the right hand side of the picture, 1\3 from the top, brass in color. i have also included a cropped, zoomed, copy of the picture.
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There was one other sighting in Las Vegas on or around November 1st 2007
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Taking pictures through window of hotel room
